name: Fruit Snail: Death?!
description:
Collect the fruit before the snail gets you!

Made for JuiceJam 2022

Heads up that the game does not have volume controls so we recommend starting it with your volume lowered.

Controls:

  • Up/W to jump
  • Left/A and Right/D to move around

Credits:

  • Tiles created by the Kenney
  • Music: Daily Beetle by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3579-daily-beetle License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
  • Fruits from OpenGameArt
